required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A First-in-human Study Looking at the Safety of ZP8396 and How it Works in the Body of Healthy Trial Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A First-in-human, Randomised, Single Ascending Dose Trial Assessing Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of ZP8396 Administered to Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The research study will investigate the safety and tolerability of ZP8396 in healthy study participants. In addition, the study will investigate how ZP8396 works in the body (pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics).
Participants will receive 1 single dose either as an injection under the skin (subcutaneous, s.c.) or an injection into a vein of one arm (intravenous, i.v.).
Participants will have 9 visits with the study team. One of these visits consists of 8 overnight stays at the study site. For each participant, the study will last up to 66 days.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: First human dose trial. A single-centre, placebo-controlled, double-blind (within cohorts), randomised single dose trial.
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment emergent adverse events (TEAEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From dosing (Day 1) to end of trial (Day 50)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (AUCτ)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve over a dosing interval

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (AUCinf)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (AUClast)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to the time of the last measurable concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum (peak) plasma drug concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to reach maximum (peak) plasma concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (λz)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Elimination rate constant

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (t½)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Elimination half-life

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (Vz/f)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent volume of distribution during terminal phase

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (Vz)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Volume of distribution during the terminal phase (i.v. only)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (CL/f)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent total clearance of the drug from plasma

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (CL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Total body clearance of the drug (i.v. only)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) of ZP8396 (MRT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 (pre-dose) to Day 50 (1176 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Mean residence time

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics (PD) of ZP8396, for dose cohorts greater than or equal to 0.7 mg (Cmax acetaminophen)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-240 minutes, relative to ingestion of MTM/acetaminophen on Day -1 and Day 5
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum acetaminophen concentration after ingestion of a standardised Mixed Test Meal (MTM) and 1000 mg acetaminophen

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics (PD) of ZP8396, for dose cohorts greater than or equal to 0.7 mg (Tmax acetaminophen)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-240 minutes, relative to ingestion of MTM/acetaminophen on Day -1 and Day 5
secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum acetaminophen concentration after ingestion of a standardised Mixed Test Meal (MTM) and 1000 mg acetaminophen

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics (PD) of ZP8396, for dose cohorts greater than or equal to 0.7 mg (AUCacetaminophen, 0-60 min)

secondary_outcome.description: Area under the acetaminophen concentration-time curve from 0 to 60 minutes after ingestion of a standardised Mixed Test Meal (MTM) and 1000 mg acetaminophen

arm_group.description: Up to 10 single dose cohorts are planned with 8 subjects in each; 6 participants in each cohort will receive active treatment.
In each of the 10 single dose cohorts, 2 subjects will receive placebo.

intervention.description: Participants will receive 1 single dose of ZP8396 given subcutaneously (s.c., under the skin) or intravenously (i.v., in a vein of the arm). Dose level will depend on the cohort.
Participants will receive 1 single dose of placebo given subcutaneously (s.c., under the skin) or intravenously (i.v., in a vein of the arm).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male subject
- Body Mass Index (BMI) between 21.0 and 29.9 kg/m^2, both inclusive
- Body weight of at least 70.0 kg
- Glycosylated hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) less than 5.7 percent
- Further inclusion criteria apply
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of metabolic diseases more frequently associated with obesity, e.g. type-2-diabetes mellitus, hypertension, dyslipidemia, heart disease or stroke
- Systolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg or >139 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure less than 50 mmHg or greater than 89 mmHg
- Symptoms of arterial hypotension
- Further exclusion criteria apply
